author: sumara
title: Darwinisms Failure to Explain the Information Enigma
text: Darwinisms Failure to Explain the Information Enigma User Name Current Events Current Events Forum - Latest political news and events I dislike the comparison of biological codes to codes of a lock. Thats massively oversimplifying it. Also, there are essentially an infinite amount of opportunities for a protein to arise.
